creator: silver_hl@hotmail.com
text:
Ant doesn't have the -cp arg. Only javac has it.
Should be "-lib" and not "-cp".            

When I do: 

"C:\apache-ant-1.6.5\bin\ant.bat" -buildfile .\Source\J2EE\build.xml jar

The output gives:
Unknown argument: -cp

In versions 1.6.2, 1.6.1, 1.6.0, 1.5.4, 1.5.3.1, 1.5.2 everything is OK. In 
1.6.3, 1.6.4 and 1.6.5 it gives that error.

The workaround is to edit the ant.bat and replace "-cp" for "-lib".

I am using sun jdk 1.5.

creator: silver_hl@hotmail.com
text:
Created attachment 18000
Ant.bat corrected after replacing -cp with -lib

creator: mbenson@apache.org
text: *** Bug 39142 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
